alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Kershaw; Lexington; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, east central Lexington, northwestern Sumter, southeastern Richland and southwestern Kershaw Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 645 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hopkins, or 7 miles east of Cayce, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Cayce, McEntire Air Base, Hopkins, Horrel Hill, Fort Jackson, Fort Jackson McCrady Training Center, Fort Jackson Cantonment Area and Fort Jackson Wildcat Road. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 82 and 87. Interstate 77 between mile markers 2 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
